lead_paragraph: The blasts occurred near bases for the United Nations and African Union, but the two organizations said that none of their personnel were among the dead.

byline.contributor: Somini Sengupta contributed reporting from the United Nations.

headline.print_headline: Militants Kill at Least 12 in Somalia
headline.main: Shabab Suicide Bombers Kill at Least 12 in Somalia’s Capital

snippet: The blasts occurred near bases for the United Nations and African Union, but the two organizations said that none of their personnel were among the dead....
abstract: Suicide bombers from Shabab militant group carry out attacks in Mogadishu, Somalia, near airport and bases for United Nations and African Union, killing at least 12 people.
